SOL.product_description: Improve your workflow outcomes with this cutting-edge yet super-easy-to-use dental 3D printer.
SOL.product_blurb: The perfect same-day chairside solution for digital dentistry. SOL sets the bar for high-speed and high-precision 3D printing. Achieve three times the speed of a regular LCD printer and maximize accuracy thanks to its 95+% LED light uniformity. The dynamic LED auto-selects curing areas to enhance accuracy and extend component life.
SOL.feature_blurb_1: Create unique 3D prints using premium resins developed by all the industry-leading manufacturers. Have the world of quality same day dentistry at your feet with SOL.
SOL.feature_blurb_2: Don't compromise. SOL reaches a printing speed of up to 4.5 cm/hr and delivers accurate dental applications the same day. Print up to 8 arches within 60 minutes.
SOL.feature_blurb_3: SOL is built to last - Ackuretta stands by its promise of high quality manufacturing and offers you an unprecedented, 2-year global warranty.
SOL.feature_blurb_4: Digital dentistry has never been more accessible than with our plug & play 3D printing solutions. Go from unboxing to printing within 30 minutes.
SOL.content_1: We strive for outstanding innovation. With SOL's unique 54 LEDs panel and dynamic optical light engine only the printing area is cured, prolonging the lifespan of the LCD screen tenfold and ensuring ultra-accurate prints. SOL minimizes the need for user maintenance and maximizes the potential for excellent results with every print.
SOL.content_2: SOL is a top-notch 3D printer that helps dental professionals to ensure consistency and quality in every print.  3D print naturally feeling, smooth and perfectly fitted dental applications thanks to its 49 μm XY resolution.
SOL.content_3: SOL's monochrome LCD screen let's you print faster than ever before. Increased UV light transmission combined with the dynamic light engine guarantee ultra-accurate results and a LCD screen that withstands even the most challenging dental workflows.
SOL.psize_title: Ideal Printing Size for Dental Applications
SOL.appls_title: What Can You Print With SOL
SOL.comp_blurb_sol: No need to compromise on speed or accuracy with SOL. The perfect chairside solution for high-precision, fast 3D printing. SOL delivers ultra-accurate results thanks to 54 LEDs that perform at 95% light uniformity.
SOL.comp_blurb_dentiq: DENTIQ prints the most intricate dental applications with an ultra-smooth finish. The intuitive user interface and the plug & play setting makes DENTIQ the ideal 3D printer for any dental professional. Start printing right out of the box.
SOL.whats_box_content_1_html:
• - SOL 3D Printer

  • - Resin Vat x2

  • - Build Platform x1

  • - Print Screen x2

  • - Power Cable x1
SOL.whats_box_content_2_html:
• - Ethernet Cable x1

  • - Wi-Fi Dongle x1

  • - Hex Key x1

  • - Alpha 3D License

  • - Basic Support Plan

DENTIQ.product_description: DENTIQ is a highly precise chairside 3D printer designed to provide an intuitive experience for every dental professional.
DENTIQ.product_blurb: DENTIQ offers a simple learning curve for beginners while providing the finer accuracy and consistency professionals desire. Remote diagnostics for machine repair, easy component replacement, built-in clean vat function, and warranty confidence makes owning DENTIQ effortless and rewarding.
DENTIQ.feature_title_1: Plug & Play, ready to use out of the box
DENTIQ.feature_paragraph_1: DENTIQ is an intuitive, beginner friendly 3D printer that helps dental professionals stay ahead in the industry by ensuring consistency and quality in every print.
DENTIQ.feature_paragraph_2: Tested, approved and certified 3D printing materials so that you can confidently print and produce repeatable results.
DENTIQ.feature_paragraph_3: Form and function geared towards clinical users for a better patient care
DENTIQ.feature_paragraph_4: DENTIQ is built to last - Ackuretta stands by its promise of high quality manufacturing and offers you an across the globe and in this industry unprecedented, 2 year warranty.
DENTIQ.feature_icon_title: Why DENTIQ is the right 3D printer for you?
DENTIQ.feat_consistency_blurb: The 47 μm pixel size of the print screen produces smoother surfaces and repeatable results with a wide range of selected materials. The bottom line is a better mouth feel for your patients.
DENTIQ.feat_ownership_blurb: Fully validated, turnkey solutions along with complete training and responsive support. Remote diagnostics for machine repair, easy component replacement, a built-in Vat cleaning function.
DENTIQ.feat_design_blurb: The angled touchscreen allows for more comfortable operation while the swivel hood provides easy access and prevents resin contamination. The leak-proof and locking vat frame keeps things in their place and the vat can now be put down onto flat surfaces.
DENTIQ.psize_title: Ideal Printing Size for Dental Applications
DENTIQ.appls_title: What Can You Print With DENTIQ
DENTIQ.comp_blurb_sol: No need to compromise on speed or accuracy with SOL. The perfect chairside solution for high-precision, fast 3D printing. SOL delivers ultra-accurate results thanks to 54 LEDs that perform at 95% light uniformity.
DENTIQ.comp_blurb_dentiq: DENTIQ prints the most intricate dental applications with an ultra-smooth finish. The intuitive user interface and the plug & play setting makes DENTIQ the ideal 3D printer for any dental professional. Start printing right out of the box.
DENTIQ.whats_box_content_1_html:
• - DENTIQ 3D Printer

  • - Resin Vat x2

  • - Build Platform x1

  • - Print Screen x3

  • - Power Cable x1
DENTIQ.whats_box_content_2_html:
• - Ethernet Cable x1

  • - Wi-Fi Dongle x1

  • - Hex Key x1

  • - Alpha 3D License

  • - Basic Support Plan

CURIE.product_description: The most versatile UV oven for 3D printing equipped with a sophisticated UV-light source management system to enable users to do more in less time and space.
CURIE.feat_blurb_1: Engineered to offer sufficient curing chamber space while maintaining a minimalistic aesthetic that matches every dental clinic and lab
CURIE.feat_blurb_2: Preloaded optimal curing times database available at the turn of a dial and touch of a button
CURIE.feat_base_blurb: Plug & Cure For all you all day
CURIE.content_1: 365/385/405 nm mix-matrix LED's for improved rigidity and suitability for Class II bio-materials.
CURIE.content_2: UV-LED's strategically positioned to provide a consistent curing for enhanced durability
CURIE.content_3: Ideal for dental professionals with bio-compatibility concenrns, CURIE cares for your Dental Applications safety so you can focus on your patients.
CURIE.fpifm_title: Finishing process in a few minutes
CURIE.fpifm_blurb_1: For Dental Clinics and Labs with rigorous workflows
CURIE.fpifm_blurb_2: Keep your material settings up to date with post-curing times and temperatures
CURIE.fpifm_blurb_3: Ensure perfect curing and long-lasting product life
CURIE.whats_box_content_1_html:
• - 1x CURIE Unit

  • - 1x Glass plate

  • - 1x Power Cord

  • - 1x SD Card

  • - 1x SD Card Reader

  • - Quick Start Guide

general.layover_blurb: CURO is a comprehensive library of 3D printing materials for dental professionals who make patient safety and satisfaction a priority
general.layover_blurb_m: CURO the comprehensive library of 3D printing materials for dental professionals
general.curo_blurb_m: Engineered to produce high-performance prints that look, feel and perform precisely as you want. The new CURO line comes with an extended 2-year shelf life, and a unique curing window of 385 nm and 405 nm, which allows across-the-board compatibility with most DLP and LCD-based polymer 3D printers in the market.
general.curo_blurb: The new CURO range is a complete and versatile resin portfolio, specifically designed for dental 3D printing, enabling dental professionals to print a wide range of dental applications. It is designed to produce high-performance prints that look, feel and perform precisely as you want. Our new CURO line comes with an extended 2-year shelf life, and a unique curing window of 385 nm and 405 nm, which allows across-the-board compatibility with most DLP and LCD-based polymer 3D printers in the market.

product.resin-desc-element_html:
Our new and improved formula enables dental professionals to print highly defined and accurate dental models. Printing models with a smooth finish and minimal shrinkage during post-processing are fundamental traits of a class-leading material such as Element. Perfect for diagnostic wax-ups, aligner thermoforming and more.
    • Application: Models & Dies
      + Anti Breakage and Discoloration
      + Great Surface Finish
      + Highly Accurate Details
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-model_html:
CURO Model is an ultra strong material featuring a minimal shrinkage and breakage formula. With rapid and repeatable results, our Curo Model resin makes 3D printing of diagnostic and implant models a carefree endeavor.
    • Application: Models & Dies
      + Smooth Finish
      + Minimal Shrinkage
      + Highly Accurate Details
      + Available in 1kg and 500g
product.resin-desc-prodenture_html:
CURO ProDenture is a class IIa biocompatible material meticulously designed for printing denture bases. Tasteless, resilient and long lasting are just some of the attributes associated with this material. 3D printing denture bases fits in seamlessly into the traditional workflow, while also increasing efficiency and reliability.
    • Application: Denture Bases
      + Natural Aesthetics
      + Long-lasting
      + Stainable
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-crown_html:
CURO Crown is a Class IIa biocompatible resin made for printing temporary crowns and bridges. The prints produced are tasteless, durable, abrasion-resistant, and have a natural tooth aesthetic. CURO Crown is formulated to be stained by popular staining kits or perfectly blend in with existing kits. Soon available in four shades; A1, A2, A3.5 and B3.
    • Application: Temporary Crowns & Bridges
      + Natural Aesthetics
      + High Strength
      + Long Term
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-splint_html:
CURO ProSplint Soft is a transparent Class IIa biocompatible material, ideal for printing splints, and night guards. With ProSplint Soft dental professionals are able to deliver comfortable, clear, and durable solutions to their patients.
    • Application: Dental Splints & Occlusal Guards
      + Maximum Comfort
      + High Break Resistance
      + Easy to Polish
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-guide_html:
CURO Guide resin is an autoclavable, transparent and rigid material designed for printing surgical guides for implant placement surgery. With high tensile strength and Class 1 biocompatibility properties, CURO Guide is the ideal tool to achieve more accurate results.
    • Application: Surgical Guides
      + Autoclavable
      + Class 1 Biocompatible
      + High Tensile Strength
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-ibt_html:
CURO IBT is a Class 1 biocompatible material that guarantees brackets are set efficiently and precisely. With great translucency, flexibility and a fast post-printing procedure, CURO IBT cuts chair time for bracket placement by 80% while increasing treatment accuracy.
    • Application: Indirect Bonding Trays
      + Great Transparency
      + Non-Stick Properties
      + Balance Between Flexibility & Rigidity
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-procast_html:
CURO ProCast offers dental professionals a clean burnout process, with minimal distortion and highly accurate prints for investment molding. Whether printing a substructure, frame or crown, our new casting formula will consistently provide smooth surfaces with the finest of details.
    • Application: Cast Partial Frameworks, Crowns & Bridges
      + Smooth Surface Finish
      + Residue-Free Burnout Process
      + B0% Polymerization Shrinkage
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-gingiva_html:
CURO Gingiva has been designed to perfectly mimic the feel and appearance of real life gum tissue. The soft and flexible texture makes it ideal for creating gums for implant models.
    • Application: Gingiva Masks
      + Natural Aesthetics
      + Flexible & Soft
      + Content 500g
product.resin-desc-tray_html:
CURO Tray allows dental professional to create custom fast-printing, durable and biocompatible impression trays. Tough mechanical properties allow the printed trays to withstand the most powerful of human bites, allowing for the most accurate impressions.
    • Application: Impression Trays
      + Improved Impression Accuracy
      + Great Adhesion with All Types of Impression Materials
      + Content 500g

general.Small_desc_html:
Printing area: 70 x 70 mm
Finishing: Anodized Metal
Compatibility: SOL 3D Printer
general.Medium_desc_html:
Printing area: 70 x 70 mm
Finishing: Anodized Metal
Compatibility: SOL 3D Printer
general.bps_tit: Your SOL 3D Printer is even faster than before
general.bps_blurb_html: Discover the brand new 🅂 Small & 🄼 Medium sized Build Platforms exclusive for the SOL
general.bps_blurb_m_html: Discover the brand new 🅂 Small and 🄼 Medium sized Build Platforms exclusive for the SOL
general.content_1: Ackuretta's breakthrough innovation ensures prints strongly attach to the Build Platform, minimizing the risk of printing failure.
general.content_2: As less resin is displaced when the platform enters the vat, less resin needs to flow back into position for printing the next layer, allowing for a shorter wait time in between layers
general.content_3: Be able to print what you need, when you need it. Full arches or short bridges, two different sizes to choose from for maximum flexibility
general.content_4: How is it possible that the size of the BP impacts the speed so much that some 3D prints are finished in up 50% faster?  There are three main factors influencing the printing speed of your printer: Continue Reading...
general.shop_now_tit: Buy them separately or as a pair

entry-dentiq.title: Digital Dentistry Entry Bundle
entry-dentiq.no_matches: No products found in this collection

Values.Testi_Office_1: Palm Beach Pure Smiles, Gold Coast, Australia
Values.Testimonials_1: Very user-friendly, my nurses picked up the firmware quite easily. Another thing that impressed me with the SOL is the speed and accuracy. It really prints flawlessly.
Values.Testi_Spec_2: Professor at the College of Medicine and Dentistry, Birmingham, UK & President of the International Digital Dental Academy
Values.Testi_Office_2: Proprietor of Dentists on THE ROCK, Bury, UK
Values.Testimonials_2: Ackuretta's ecosystem is quickly becoming renowned for providing the dental sector with an excellent range of well thought out and reliable 3D printing products. The extensive range of resin profiles along with the software integration with dental technologies such as Exocad and Medit have meant that the Ackuretta Sol, Cleanie and Curie are indispensable components in my digital dentistry workflows.
Values.Testi_Office_3: NorthCare Dental Center, Hamilton, New Zealand
Values.Testimonials_3: Ackuretta have been surprisingly good with checking in on me and making sure I'm having a good experience with their products and I get answers to questions within minutes rather than days as with other companies.
Values.Testi_Spec_4: Dr. D Arunachalam Private Practice Adjunct Prof. (Periodontology and Implant Dentistry)
Values.Testi_Office_4: Principal Dentist at Smiles India Dental Office, SRIHER, Chennai, India
Values.Testimonials_4: Quality-Speed-Cost, Impossible? Try Ackuretta 3D printers. Been using them lately and seeing great quality , terrific economic value and superfast turnaround times in my implant and prosthetic work. Try them, you will be hooked in no time!
Values.Testi_Spec_5: Dentist, Dental Technician & Lecturer at the University of Chile, Santiago
Values.Testimonials_5: Excellent machine and software Since I removed it from the box, it has been a very nice experience. It's good looking, the user interface is pretty simple and the best part is that there is no need to calibrate it. The other great thing is the alfa software that makes things even easier as it has all the resins in a list in order to have the exact parameters. It's a real plug and play and the printing quality is outstanding even in the standard quality.
Values.mission_s: We create a 3D printing ecosystem that is adaptive, advanced and accessible, to help lead and empower the digital dentistry industry into the future.
Values.company_value_blurb_1: Self-developed hardware, software, and proprietary materials, offering fully validated, turnkey solutions since our inception.
Values.company_value_blurb_2: An innovator and manufacturer of high precision, chair-side solutions of industrial-grade 3D printers and finishing kits for the digital dentistry industry.
Values.company_value_blurb_3: Everything we do is built around a simple learning curve that is ideal for clinics, with zero calibration required.
Values.company_value_blurb_4: Ackuretta is essentially a technology company. There will always be change, and we contribute to it whenever we have the opportunity or see the need.
Values.CEO_Message: Technology is an equalizing force, an enabler that should be of benefit to everyone on the planet. Now, at the first light of the 4th Industrial Revolution, Ackuretta is already striving to innovate and realize the future of dental technologies. My mission is to lead Ackuretta in the pursuit of technological breakthroughs as we envision a world where our products deliver smiles to the millions around us.
Values.CTO_Experience_html:
• One of the few global experts in DLP based 3D Printing
  • 15 years of experience in Optical design for 3D printing
  • Creator of Taiwan Excellence Award winning 3D Printer
Values.HOM_Experience_html:
José is a Mexican-born Marketing Specialist with more than ten years of experience in IoT. He completed a Bachelor's degree in 3D Animation and Digital Arts at the Monterrey Institute of Technology and a Master's in Intercultural Marketing in Taipei, Taiwan.
Moved by discovering new cultures and places.
Talk to him in Spanish, Portuguese, English, or Chinese.
José loves coding! He developed the very website you're reading right now.
He feels very lucky to manage the marketing department at Ackuretta, integrated by wonderful and smart professionals.

  • - E-commerce strategy and development is his speciality. Talk Funnels, journeys and personas.
Values.COM_Experience_html:
Proud to join Ackuretta's Marketing team and being part of the evolution in digital dentistry.

Responsible for:

  • - Planning & executing a growth-oriented social media strategy
  • - Researching & writing 3D printing-related blog content
  • - Customer success management
  • - KOL acquisition & management
Values.DMM_Experience_html: Guillermo is a data and result driven Digital Marketer who focuses in SEM & SEO, email and paid media advertisement. He loves to interact with new technologies but also appreciates interpersonal relationships, which are crucial for personal and professional growth. Interests: Cooking, Dragon Boat, Squash, Cycling, Swimming, Boardgames, Poker, Video-gaming, reading, etc.
Values.SAM_Experience_html: I'm a self-disciplined and curious Israeli, who is currently based in Taiwan while working for a leading company in the field of Digital Dentistry. I can speak 3 languages, I have considerable experience in both international sales and B2C & B2B marketing, and I am always on the lookout to learn new things. Would be happy to connect and discuss things like tasty food, the latest in the world of tech, dogs, drumming, and Digital Dentistry.
Values.TEM_Experience_html:
See a need, fill a need. I graduated in electrical engineering, majoring in embedded system, thesis was maze algorithm, had competition champions of autonomous robot for both home and abroad, had OEM and ODM experience before, currently working for OBM, mainly working at firmware and knows how to make a system from hardware to firmware. Products had keyboards, mouse, pedelec bike and 3D printers. So far, all staying in manufacture industrial.

  • 10 years in high tech product design and engineering
  • 5 years in 3D Printer Software and Electronics Design
  • AI developer for Ackuretta products
Values.UID_Experience_html:
Dedicated graphic designer with a demonstrated history of working in both print-based and online-based media industry. Skilled in UI and Editorial Design, Corporate Identity and Photography. Rich experience in implementing visual design across different platforms or medium, such as prints, books, webs and mobile devices.

  • UI and UX design for high-end 3D printers and their websites, mobile applications.
  • Image editing and post-production for product images.
Values.Join_Team_blurb: Learn more and apply to a career opportunities at Ackuretta

onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

ecosystem.ecosystem_tagline2: Join the Evolution in Digital Dentistry
ecosystem.ecosystem_blurb: Ackuretta helps dental professionals stay ahead in the industry by ensuring consistency and quality in every print. Same-day dentistry made a reality.

showcase.printer_tagline: Versatile and intuitive LCD printer that makes same-day dentistry a reality.
showcase.printer_blurb: Our printers streamline workflows for dentists with preprogrammed, validated settings that guarantee the highest quality dental applications.
showcase.dlp_blurb: Professional-grade DLP 3D printing made easy thanks to the premium materials and robust engineering delivered in a compact design.
showcase.cleani_blurb: Save time and increase efficiency with CLEANI, a portable washer that reduces alcohol consumption by 50% and removes 90% of resin residue for your 3D prints.
showcase.oven_tagline: 360º perfect UV light distribution for a uniform curing.
showcase.oven_blurb: Equipped with a sophisticated UV-light source management system to ensure all resins that react to wavelengths 365, 385, and 405nm can cure completely and efficiently, with strengthened print hardness.
showcase.alpha_tagline: Slicing software specially designed for dental industry.
showcase.alpha_blurb: No more guesswork thanks to its preprogrammed parameters enabling users to support parts in 3 clicks. Intuitive orientation, layout and nesting
showcase.curo_tagline: Biocompatible medical-grade material with 2-year shelf life.
showcase.curo_blurb: Ideal for any dental application on both DLP and LCD technologies. It features a curing window from 385 to 405 nm, which allows compatibility with most 3D printers in the market.
